articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from third practice and qualifying at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
articles.title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix final practice - radio & text

articles.description: Manchester City host Liverpool in a game that could shape the course of the title race - with Jurgen Klopp saying his team must take their chances.
articles.title: 'The strongest team in the world' - can Liverpool stop Man City?

articles.description: Jevon Holland's sensational interception touchdown helps the Miami Dolphins to a 34-13 victory at the New York Jets.
articles.title: Holland scores 99-yard touchdown in Dolphins win

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane scores again as Bayern Munich win at Cologne to move top of the German Bundesliga table.
articles.title: Record-breaking Kane sends Bayern top of Bundesliga

articles.description: Paris St-Germain warm up for their vital Champions League tie against Newcastle by beating Monaco to go four points clear at the top of Ligue 1.
articles.title: Mbappe scores as Ligue 1 leaders PSG beat Monaco

articles.description: Alex de Minaur cruises past Emil Ruusuvuori in straight sets as Australia beat Finland 2-0 to reach a second successive Davis Cup final.
articles.title: 'Pride and passion' as Australia reach Davis Cup final

articles.description: Before Chantelle Cameron defends her undisputed title against Katie Taylor in Dublin on Saturday, BBC Sport rounds up predictions from the boxing world.
articles.title: Cameron v Taylor 2 - big-fight predictions

articles.description: The former Paralympian has been serving a 13-year sentence for murdering girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.
articles.title: Oscar Pistorius to be freed on parole

articles.description: Fifa opens disciplinary proceedings after fighting delayed the start of a World Cup qualifying match between Brazil and Argentina.
articles.title: Fifa investigating Brazil-Argentina disorder

articles.description: Sir Elton John says getting manager Graham Taylor to Watford was one of the greatest moments of his life and he still goes "crazy" supporting the team.
articles.title: 'One of my greatest moments' - Sir Elton John on his love of Watford
